txt.en: Lúmar has asked you to lessen the number of goblins present in Pinnath Gelin.\n\nYou should look for goblins north of Iáphel, in Pinnath Gelin.
'It is most concerning that you came across so many goblins.'
You have dealt a blow to the goblins in Pinnath Gellin. You should let Lúmar know that you lessened the threat you found.\n\nLúmar is in Ost Arndír.

'Igerna went north following reports of goblin activity at the nearby farm. This news is quite troubling, if true. If you happen to come across any of the foul creatures, reducing their numbers would do much to lessen their threat to Pinnath Gelin.'
News has reached the scouts of goblins slithering their way out of dank tunnels under the mountains about Pinnath Gelin.
'It is most concerning that you came across so many goblins. Let us hope this is the only instance of them in our land, but I fear it is not so.'
'Igerna went north following reports of goblin activity at the nearby farm.'
Speak to Lúmar in Ost Arndír
